event.name: Bolhao Market
event.description: Renovated traditional market hall with fresh produce, local cheeses, cured meats, and flowers.

event.name: Sao Bento Railway Station
event.description: Working train station famous for its entrance hall decorated with 20,000 azulejo tiles.
event.address: Praca de Almeida Garrett, 4000-069 Porto, Portugal

event.name: Clerigos Tower
event.description: Iconic baroque bell tower offering panoramic views of Porto after climbing 240 steps.
event.address: R. de Sao Filipe de Nery, 4050-546 Porto, Portugal

event.name: Francesinha at Cafe Santiago
event.description: Try Porto's iconic Francesinha sandwich, a hearty dish with layers of meat, cheese, and spicy sauce.
event.address: R. de Passos Manuel 226, 4000-382 Porto, Portugal

event.name: Ribeira District Walk
event.description: Stroll along the colorful Ribeira waterfront, a UNESCO World Heritage Site along the Douro River.

event.name: Douro River Cruise
event.description: Relaxing six-bridge cruise along the Douro River with views of Porto and Vila Nova de Gaia.

event.name: Sandeman Port Wine Cellar Tour
event.description: Guided tour and tasting at one of the most famous port wine cellars in Vila Nova de Gaia.
event.address: Largo Miguel Bombarda 3, 4430-175 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
